author: MSNBC
title: Trump's immigration crackdown will make America's population slowdown much worse
description: Trump's anti-immigration policies will make the economic consequences of the coming population slowdown much, much worse.
content:
A group of about 30 Brazilian migrants get into a U.S. Border Patrol van in Sunland Park, New Mexico, on March 20, 2019.
